home.title: Javier Gutierrez-Ramirez
home.description: M.Sc. in Computer Science Â· AI & Computer Vision Engineer. Applied artificial intelligence for biological systems and scientific software.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: I am a computer scientist specializing in applied artificial intelligence and computer vision, with experience in developing intelligent systems for biological analysis, digital health, and data-driven platforms. I hold a B.Sc. in Computer Systems Engineering and an M.Sc. in Computer Science, where my research focused on real-time image processing and neural inference for microalgae culture monitoring. My work combines machine learning, scientific software engineering, and interdisciplinary collaboration, with a strong emphasis on reproducibility, open science, and the translation of research into practical, high-impact solutions.

research.title: Research
research.section1: My research interests focus on the design of intelligent computational systems for the analysis, modeling, and control of complex systems, with particular emphasis on biological and environmental applications. I am interested in the integration of machine learning, computer vision, and embedded systems for real-time decision-making, as well as their extension to aerospace-related domains.

my_projects.title: Bioharvest
my_projects.resume: Monitoring and growth analysis system for microalgae cultures using neural networks and computer vision.

my_projects.title: Evaluasaurio
my_projects.resume: Evaluation platform that allows students to anonymously assess the performance of their instructors in their respective subjects.

my_projects.title: Axiom
my_projects.resume: Platform for recording and tracking open science projects on the blockchain.

my_projects.title: Segucom
my_projects.resume: Monitoring and management software for public force elements, aimed at improving transparency in police operations.

my_projects.title: Glucontrol
my_projects.resume: Mobile app for monitoring glucose, diet, and physical activity, integrating biological data analysis for health tracking.

my_projects.title: Life-Up
my_projects.resume: Platform for managing and optimizing activities, attendance records, and performance in gerontological centers.

my_projects.title: Stellarium
my_projects.resume: Interactive web application to visualize NEAs, NECs, and PHAs and explore their orbits through dynamic models.
